title: When will I find out the results of my MRI scan?
paragraph: [’The results of the scan will be sent directly to the referring clinician within 7-10 days from the time of the scan.’,’The results of the scan will be sent directly to the referring clinician within 7-10 days from the time of the scan.’]

title: When should I arrive for my appointment?
paragraph: [‘You should arrive at the clinic 15 minutes before your appointment. Please bring any x-rays or scans that you have been asked to bring.’]
